properties.name: data
properties.description: Add any random data, specially to angular.js dashboards. Should be searilzabled to allow to save it to the API.
properties.rawdescription:
Add any random data, specially to angular.js dashboards.
Should be searilzabled to allow to save it to the API.

properties.name: description
properties.rawdescription: The description shown on add widget

properties.name: errorStrategy
properties.description: Determines if dynamic component or widget itself should render alerts.
properties.rawdescription: Determines if dynamic component or widget itself should render alerts.

properties.name: injector
properties.description: The injector to use to inject this component. If used in a module federation plugin, the injector of the plugin should be used. Defaults to the root injector.
properties.rawdescription:
The injector to use to inject this component. If used in a module federation
plugin, the injector of the plugin should be used. Defaults to the root injector.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label shown for this dynamic component on add widgets
properties.rawdescription: The label shown for this dynamic component on add widgets

properties.name: previewImage
properties.rawdescription: An url to an preview image.

properties.name: resolve
properties.description: Attributes of the dynamic components configuration to be resolved.
properties.rawdescription: Attributes of the dynamic components configuration to be resolved.
